mapper.select: SELECT t1.*, t0.total_qty as stock_qty FROM inv_stock t0 INNER JOIN yujiakeji_materials t1 ON t0.material_code = t1.material_code WHERE t0.del_flag = 0 AND t0.total_qty > 0 AND t0.material_code = #{materialCode} AND t0.warehouse_code = #{warehouseCode} ORDER BY t1.material_code ASC

SELECT t0.* , ifnull(t1.total_qty,0) as stock_qty FROM yujiakeji_materials t0 LEFT JOIN inv_stock t1 ON t0.material_code = t1.material_code AND t1.warehouse_code='A01A03A04A03' WHERE t0.del_flag = 0 AND t0.material_code = #{materialCode} ORDER BY t0.material_code ASC
